== Main Inclusion Report for zope2.8 ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in universe, builds on all architectures.
 0. ''Rationale:'' 
** Zope2.8 is the current stable release of the well-known python web application framework. 
** "<nowiki>[[http://plone.org|Plone]]</nowiki>" and "<nowiki>[[http://www.cps-project.org|CPS]]</nowiki>" are based on Zope2.8, and they are a must for a server-oriented distribution.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** Some issues in the past; upstream supports multiple stable releases.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs to setup instances after install, which could be done through dzhandle utility from zope-common package (already in main).
** No bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/zope2.8|Debbugs]]</nowiki>"
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** python2.3, zope-common (already in main)
** python2.3-xml binary missing in main
